summary: A cynical man, along with a 19 year old musician, a former lover, an alcoholic client of a bar and a black strip club dancer are involved with anarchist mood in a dangerous game with drugs godfathers of the night, cops and media.
cast: Giannis Angelakas|Jenny Kitseli|Ifigenia Asteriadi|Simeon Nikolaidis|Louise Attah|Ioanna Pappa|Savva Loumi|Melissa Stoili|Maro Mavri|Christos Houliaras|George Houliaras|Kostas Katsikis|Dimitris Katsimanis|Themis Katz|Stefanos Lazarinos|Grigoris Pimenidis|Notis Pitsilos|Takis Tsagaris|Michele Valley
keywords: bound and gagged|tape gag|tape over mouth|hands tied behind back|duct tape over mouth
title: O hamenos ta pairnei ola
